title: If there is no data for series, it should display a friendly error message
OB: When selecting a column without data for a series in the chart, no error message is displayed.
EB: When selecting a column without data for a series in the chart, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a chart. 2. Set the data definition. 3. Select a column that has no data.
